description: Docker wrapper for verapdf PDF validation (for use with Quarto)
notes: This wrapper runs verapdf through Docker via WSL. Requires:
- WSL distribution with docker accessible (or docker PowerShell function configured)
- verapdf/cli:latest image (will pull automatically on first use)
QUARTO_VERAPDF environment variable has been set automatically.
Quarto will now use Docker-based verapdf instead of built-in Java version.
The wrapper uses your existing 'docker' command/function.
If you have a custom docker wrapper, ensure it forwards commands correctly.
To test: quarto render <file>.qmd --to pdf with 'pdf-standard: ua-2' in YAML
To switch back to built-in verapdf, run: scoop uninstall verapdf-docker
